items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Courses and Educational Materials

*   [Paulescu/hands-on-rl: Free course that takes you from zero to Reinforcement Learning PRO ü¶∏üèª‚Äçü¶∏üèΩ (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/Paulescu/hands-on-rl)

### Programming Frameworks for LLMs

*   [DSPy: Not Your Average Prompt Engineering](https://jina.ai/news/dspy-not-your-average-prompt-engineering/): a post about the DSPy, a framework developed by the Stanford NLP group aimed at algorithmically optimizing language model prompts

### LLM Evaluation / Multi-agents

*   [LLM Evaluation: Everything You Need To Run, Benchmark Evals](https://arize.com/blog-course/llm-evaluation-the-definitive-guide/)
*   [The Ultimate Guide to LLM Product Evaluation](https://blog.context.ai/the-ultimate-guide-to-llm-product-evaluation/)
*   [How to Evaluate, Compare, and Optimize LLM Systems](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/how-evaluate-compare-optimize-llm-systems-b%C3%BClent-uyaniker-jw4qc)
*   [LLM Evaluation | Clarifai Guide](https://docs.clarifai.com/portal-guide/evaluate/llms/)
*   [How to Evaluate LLM Applications: The Complete Guide - Confident AI](https://www.confident-ai.com/blog/how-to-evaluate-llm-applications)
*   [AI Evaluation Metrics | Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/playbook/technology-guidance/generative-ai/working-with-llms/eval-metrics)
*   [How to Evaluate Large Language Model Outputs: Current Best Practices | FinetuneDB](https://finetunedb.com/blog/how-to-evaluate-large-language-model-outputs/)
*   [The Ultimate Guide to LLM Evaluation | Deci](https://deci.ai/blog/llm-evaluation-ultimate-guide/)
*   [Large Language Model Evaluation in 2024: 5 Methods](https://research.aimultiple.com/large-language-model-evaluation/)
*   [Aligning with Human Judgement: The Role of Pairwise Preference in Large Language Model Evaluators](https://arxiv.org/html/2403.16950v2)
*   [Judging LLM-as-a-Judge with MT-Bench and Chatbot Arena](https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.05685)
*   [LLM Evaluation Metrics: Everything You Need for LLM Evaluation - Confident AI](https://www.confident-ai.com/blog/llm-evaluation-metrics-everything-you-need-for-llm-evaluation)
*   [Criteria Evaluation | ü¶úÔ∏èüîó LangChain](https://python.langchain.com/docs/guides/productionization/evaluation/string/criteria_eval_chain/)
*   [Evaluation of LLMs - Part 1](https://blog.premai.io/evaluation-of-llms-part-1/)
*   [Evaluation of LLMs - Part 2](https://blog.premai.io/evaluation-of-llms-part-2/)
*   [The Crucial Role of Model Evaluation in LLM and AI Integrations](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/crucial-role-model-evaluation-llm-ai-integrations-vijay-chaudhary)
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Blogs / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-university](https://blog.angular-university.io/) - Learn and Keep Up with the Angular Ecosystem.

### Integrations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ckeditor5-angular (‚≠ê211)](https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5-angular) - An official CKEditor 5 rich text editor component for Angular 2+.
*   [ckeditor4-angular (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor4-angular) - An official CKEditor 4 rich text editor component for Angular 2+.
*   [TailwindCSS + Angular](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/guides/angular) - Integrate Angular app with Tailwind.

### Free / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [sakai-ng (‚≠ê796)](https://github.com/primefaces/sakai-ng) - Free Angular Admin Template by PrimeNG.
*   [devextreme-angular-template (‚≠ê120)](https://github.com/DevExpress/devextreme-angular-template) - Responsive Application Layout Templates‚Äã based on DevExtreme Angular Components.
*   [Threejs (‚≠ê235)](https://github.com/JohnnyDevNull/ng-three-template) - New Three.js starter app.

### Animations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-confetti-explosion (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/ChellappanRajan/ngx-confetti-explosion) - Confetti in Angular.

### Charts / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng2-charts (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/valor-software/ng2-charts) - Beautiful charts for Angular2 based on Chart.js.
*   [ng-chartist (‚≠ê125)](https://github.com/willsoto/ng-chartist) - Angular component for Chartist.js.
*   [systelab-charts (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/systelab/systelab-charts) - Systelab Angular Chart services.
*   [ngx-gantt (‚≠ê280)](https://github.com/worktile/ngx-gantt) - A modern and powerful gantt chart component for Angular.

### Drag and Drop / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-drag-drop (‚≠ê322)](https://github.com/reppners/ngx-drag-drop) - Angular directives using the native HTML Drag And Drop API.
*   [ng-dnd (‚≠ê127)](https://github.com/ng-dnd/ng-dnd) - Drag and Drop for Angular.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng2-file-upload (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/valor-software/ng2-file-upload) - Easy to use file upload directives.
*   [ngx-uploadx (‚≠ê44)](https://github.com/kukhariev/ngx-uploadx) - Angular Resumable Upload Module.

### Layout Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-split (‚≠ê904)](https://github.com/bertrandg/angular-split) - Angular split component.

### Modals / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-awesome-popup (‚≠ê72)](https://github.com/boris-jenicek/ngx-awesome-popup) - Angular dialog modal framework (Confirmation box, Alert box, Toast notification and Cookie banner).
*   [dialog (‚≠ê399)](https://github.com/ngneat/dialog) - A simple to use, highly customizable, and powerful modal.
*   [ngx-modal-ease (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/GreenFlag31/modal-library) - `ngx-modal-ease` is a versatile Angular library providing a lightweight, simple, and performant modal.

### Unspecified / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-clarity (‚≠ê383)](https://github.com/vmware-clarity/ng-clarity) - Clarity Angular is a scalable, accessible, customizable, open-source design system built for Angular.
*   [ngx-semantic (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/ngx-semantic/ngx-semantic) - A new take on an Angular implementation for Semantic UI.

### Bootstrap Based / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-bootstrap-md](https://mdbootstrap.com/docs/angular/) - Material Design
    for Bootstrap 5 & Angular 17.
*   [ng-bootstrap](https://ng-bootstrap.github.io) - Angular widgets built from the ground up using only Bootstrap 5 CSS with APIs designed for the Angular ecosystem.
*   [ngx-bootstrap (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/valor-software/ngx-bootstrap) - Fast and reliable Bootstrap widgets in Angular (supports Ivy engine).

### Node Based / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-vflow (‚≠ê328)](https://github.com/artem-mangilev/ngx-vflow) - An open source library to build node-based UI with Angular.

### UX Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [skyux (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/blackbaud/skyux) - SKY UX components for Angular.

### Misc Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-countdown (‚≠ê197)](https://github.com/cipchk/ngx-countdown) - Simple, easy and performant countdown.
*   [rx-computed (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/jscutlery/devkit/tree/main/packages/rx-computed) - The async RxJS-based version of signals' `computed()`.

### TypeScript / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [typescript-challenges (‚≠ê169)](https://github.com/psmyrdek/typescript-challenges) - A set of challenges helping you understand TypeScript.
items.content_html:

  • systelab-charts (‚≠ê0) - Systelab Angular Chart services.

  • dialog (‚≠ê399) - A simple to use, highly customizable, and powerful modal.
  • ngx-modal-ease (‚≠ê17) - ngx-modal-ease is a versatile Angular library providing a lightweight, simple, and performant modal.

  • ngx-semantic (‚≠ê6) - A new take on an Angular implementation for Semantic UI.

Bootstrap Based / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-bootstrap - Angular widgets built from the ground up using only Bootstrap 5 CSS with APIs designed for the Angular ecosystem.
  • ngx-bootstrap (‚≠ê5.5k) - Fast and reliable Bootstrap widgets in Angular (supports Ivy engine).
